meanings.definition: Belief in the doctrine of postmillennialism.
meanings.sent1: Many people hold postmillennialisms as their faith.
meanings.sent2: The professor's postmillennialisms were evident in his lectures.
meanings.sent3: The debate about postmillennialisms turned into a friendly discussion.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to postmillennialisms shone brightly in her actions.
meanings.sent5: The book explained postmillennialisms in a way that was easy to understand.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of postmillennialism.
meanings.sent1: His interest in postmillennialisms led him to research extensively.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to postmillennialisms.
meanings.sent3: The group's postmillennialisms meetings were always engaging.
meanings.sent4: She approached her postmillennialisms studies with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The documentary provided a detailed look into postmillennialisms.
